verses.verse: But it came to pass <S%H5571>that<s%>, when Sanballat <S%H8085>heard<s%> that we were <S%H1129>building<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, he was <S%H2734>wroth<s%>, and took <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H3707>indignation<s%>, and <S%H3932>mocked<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>.

And he <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What are these <S%H537>feeble<s%> <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H6213>doing<s%>? will they <S%H5800>fortify<s%> <S%H2076>themselves<s%>? will they sacrifice? will they make an <S%H3615>end<s%> in a <S%H3117>day<s%>? will they <S%H2421>revive<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H6194>heaps<s%> of <S%H6083>rubbish<s%>, seeing they are <S%H8313>burned<s%>?

Now <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> was by <S%H681>him<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Even that which they are <S%H1129>building<s%>, if a <S%H7776>fox<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%>, he shall break <S%H6555>down<s%> their <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O our <S%H430>God<s%>; for we are <S%H939>despised<s%>: and <S%H7725>turn<s%> back their <S%H2781>reproach<s%> upon their own <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them up for a <S%H961>spoil<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7633>captivity<s%>;

and <S%H3680>cover<s%> not their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and let not their <S%H2403>sin<s%> be blotted <S%H4229>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3707>thee<s%>; for they have provoked thee to anger before the <S%H1129>builders<s%>.

So we <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>; and all the <S%H2346>wall<s%> was joined <S%H7194>together<s%> unto <S%H2677>half<s%> the height <S%H5971>thereof<s%>: for the people had a <S%H3820>mind<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%>.

But it came to pass <S%H5571>that<s%>, when Sanballat, and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>, and the <S%H6163>Arabians<s%>, and the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%>, and the <S%H796>Ashdodites<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the repairing of the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> went <S%H724>forward<s%>, and that the <S%H6555>breaches<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to be <S%H5640>stopped<s%>, then they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>wroth<s%>;
and they <S%H7194>conspired<s%> all of them <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and to cause confusion <S%H6213>therein<s%>.
But we made our <S%H6419>prayer<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5975>set<s%> a <S%H4929>watch<s%> against them <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, because of <S%H6440>them<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3581>strength<s%> of the bearers of <S%H5449>burdens<s%> is <S%H3782>decayed<s%>, and there is <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H6083>rubbish<s%>; so that we are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

And our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They shall not <S%H3045>know<s%>, neither <S%H7200>see<s%>, till we <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H8432>of<s%> <S%H2026>them<s%>, and slay <S%H4399>them<s%>, and cause the work to <S%H7673>cease<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3064>that<s%>, when the Jews that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> by <S%H681>them<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, they <S%H559>said<s%> unto us <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> from all <S%H4725>places<s%>, Ye must return unto <S%H7725>us<s%>.

Therefore <S%H5975>set<s%> I in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H4725>parts<s%> of the space <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, in the open <S%H6706>places<s%>, I <S%H5975>set<s%> there the <S%H5971>people<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords<s%>, their <S%H7420>spears<s%>, and their <S%H7198>bows<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2715>nobles<s%>, and to the <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, and to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Be not ye <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H6440>them<s%>: <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, who is <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> for your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, your <S%H802>wives<s%>, and your <S%H1004>houses<s%>.

And it came to <S%H341>pass<s%>, when our enemies <S%H8085>heard<s%> that it was <S%H3045>known<s%> unto <S%H430>us<s%>, and God had <S%H6565>brought<s%> their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> to <S%H6565>nought<s%>, that we <S%H7725>returned<s%> all of us to the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> unto his <S%H4399>work<s%>.

And it came to pass from that <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H2677>forth<s%>, that half of my <S%H5288>servants<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H7420>spears<s%>, the <S%H4043>shields<s%>, and the <S%H7198>bows<s%>, and the <S%H8302>coats<s%> of <S%H8269>mail<s%>; and the rulers were <S%H310>behind<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

They all <S%H1129>builded<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> and they that <S%H5375>bare<s%> <S%H5447>burdens<s%> <S%H6006>laded<s%> <S%H259>themselves<s%>; every one with one of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%>, and with the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H2388>held<s%> his <S%H7973>weapon<s%>;

and the <S%H1129>builders<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> had his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H631>girded<s%> by his <S%H4975>side<s%>, and so <S%H1129>builded<s%>. And he that <S%H8628>sounded<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> was by <S%H681>me<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2715>nobles<s%>, and to the <S%H5461>rulers<s%> and to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, The <S%H4399>work<s%> is <S%H7235>great<s%> and <S%H7342>large<s%>, and we are <S%H6504>separated<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, <S%H376>one<s%> far <S%H7350>from<s%> <S%H251>another<s%>:
in what <S%H4725>place<s%> soever ye <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, <S%H6908>resort<s%> ye thither unto <S%H430>us<s%>; our God will fight for <S%H3898>us<s%>.

So we <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%>: and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H7420>spears<s%> from the <S%H5927>rising<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%> till the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H3318>appeared<s%>.

Likewise at the same <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> I unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Let every <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that in the <S%H3915>night<s%> they may be a <S%H4929>guard<s%> to <S%H4399>us<s%>, and may labor in the <S%H3117>day<s%>.

So neither <S%H251>I<s%>, nor my brethren, nor my <S%H5288>servants<s%>, nor the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4929>guard<s%> that <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H587>me<s%>, none of us put <S%H6584>off<s%> our <S%H899>clothes<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> went with his <S%H7973>weapon<s%> to the <S%H4325>water<s%>.
